pwa:build.description: Builds PWA project and packs for SFDC deployment
examples:
# Uses initialized plugin settings
$ sfdx pwa:build

    === Building PWA for SFDC
    ...
    Building PWA... Done

    PWA built and packed for SFDC deployment!

# Flag overrides take precedence over plugin settings
# After plugin will finish execution you will be offered to update plugin settings
$ sfdx pwa:build
  -b build:sfdc (--buildcmd=build:commandname)
  -m yarn (--packagemanager=(npm|yarn|pnpm))
  -p client (--ngpath=relative/path/to/angular-app)
  -t forceApp/main/ngApp (--sfdcpath=relative/path/to/sfdc-folder)
  --apiversion 42.0
  --ngproject ng-app-name
  --sfdcpage PageName
  --sfdcresource StaticResourceName

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

pwapath.name: pwapath
pwapath.description: Relative path to PWA project (folder with PWA's package.json)

sfdcpath.name: sfdcpath
sfdcpath.description: Relative path to SFDC target dir

pwa:init.description: Initializes files and settings for plugin
examples:
$ sfdx pwa:init
 Starts plugin configuration wizard

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

pwa:ngx-build.description: Builds PWA project and packs for SFDC deployment
examples:
# Uses initialized plugin settings
$ sfdx pwa:ngx-build

    === Building Angular project for SFDC
    ...
    Creating Angular SFDC application... Done

    Angular project built and packed for SFDC deployment!

# Flag overrides take precedence over plugin settings
# After plugin will finish execution you will be offered to update plugin settings
$ sfdx pwa:ngx-build
  -b build:sfdc (--buildcmd=build:commandname)
  -m yarn (--packagemanager=(npm|yarn|pnpm))
  -p client (--ngpath=relative/path/to/angular-app)
  -t forceApp/main/ngApp (--sfdcpath=relative/path/to/sfdc-folder)
  --apiversion 42.0
  --ngproject ng-app-name
  --sfdcpage PageName
  --sfdcresource StaticResourceName

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

ngpath.name: ngpath
ngpath.description: Relative path to PWA project (folder with PWA's package.json)

sfdcpath.name: sfdcpath
sfdcpath.description: Relative path to SFDC target dir
